review: I'm too glad! It works fabolous with NETFLIX!
author: Manuel Turcios

review: The device itself is good. It performs as intended but only thing lacking are apps. On the Chromecast page at [...] which links to the relevant section/page in the Playstore app of my mobile i see only 4 apps listed of which 3 are from Google. Although, on doing a simple search like "chromecast compatible apps" on Google Playstore mobile appp I can see a wide ranging list of compatible apps, Google should make all the Chromecast compatible apps available through the Chromecast section on the Playstore. I hope Amazon.com continues to ship the product to India. It's much better to get it from here then to buy it from dubious sellers marauding the Indian e-commerce space.
author: manoj tirkey

review: Our first one broke off because we didn't use the extender. Use the extender.
